tool.name: SAGA.shapes_polygons.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayLINES False output_data_POLYGONS $output_data_POLYGONS name SAGA.shapes_polygons.3 LINES $LINES SINGLE $SINGLE MERGE $MERGE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_POLYGONS $OutputSection_POLYGONS.outputType_POLYGONS transmissionMode_POLYGONS $OutputSection_POLYGONS.transmissionMode_POLYGONS

param.name: LINES
param.label: Lines
param.help: Lines The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: MERGE
param.label: Merge Line Parts to One Polygon
param.help: Merge Line Parts to One Polygon

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_POLYGONS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Converts lines to polygons. Line arcs are closed to polygons simply by connecting the last point with the first. Optionally parts of polylines can be merged into one polygon optionally.
